# delimiter

**Instance Property**

The character that separates the data fields in a CSV file.

## Declaration

```swift
var delimiter: String
```

## Specifying the CSV file format

- **containsHeader**: A Boolean value indicating whether an input CSV file contains a header.
- **lineTerminator**: The character that represents the end of a line in a CSV file.

items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether an input CSV file contains a header.
